title: Quarto ü§ù Julia
text:
Julia-themed Quarto.
The quarto-julia repo is a simple Quarto extension that makes a number of Julia-themed Custom Formats for Quarto available.
On this website you can find a number of examples that demonstrate how the extension can be used and what kind of output it can produce.
As you may have guessed from the design, this very website uses the quarto-julia extension.

title: Quarto and Documenter.jl
text: Since Documenter.jl takes Markdown documents as input, you can use Quarto with Documenter.jl for package documentation.

title: Julia-themed Revealjs
text: Remember PowerPoint? ü§® boring ‚Ä¶ how about using Revealjs for your next presentation instead. You can find an example slide deck here.

title: Revealjs Presentation
text:
Details
The theme is based on the default theme and adds various custom formatting options.
Font
The theme uses the JuliaMono font.
Colors
Code
Inline code looks like this print("hello üåç").

print("hello üåç")
Callouts






Note


This is a note in julia_blue.









Tip


This is a tip in julia_green.









Caution


This is a caution callout in julia_purple.









Warning


This is a warning in julia_purple.









Important


This is an important callout in julia_red.
